scripts.db:generate: dotenv -e apps/web/.env.local -- sh -c 'cd packages/prisma && npx prisma generate'
scripts.db:push: dotenv -e apps/web/.env.local -- sh -c 'cd packages/prisma && npx prisma db push'
scripts.db:migrate: dotenv -e apps/web/.env.local -- sh -c 'cd packages/prisma && npx prisma migrate dev'
scripts.db:studio: dotenv -e apps/web/.env.local -- sh -c 'cd packages/prisma && npx prisma studio'
